basicInformationSection.description: Provide the key details about the doctoral position, such as title, field of study, and supervising professor.

researchArea.label: Research Area
researchArea.toolTipText: Specify the main Research Area the doctoral position focuses on.

startDate.label: Start Date of Job
startDate.toolTipText: Expected start date for this position.

applicationDeadline.label: Application Deadline
applicationDeadline.toolTipText: After this date, applying is no longer possible.

workload.label: Workload
workload.toolTipText: Indicate the expected workload for the doctoral position in hours per week (e.g. 20). You can enter up to 40 h/week.

contractDuration.label: Contract Duration
contractDuration.toolTipText: Indicate the duration of the contract for the doctoral position in years (e.g. 1.5). You can enter up to 6 years.

positionDetailsSection.description: Describe the research focus, main tasks, and expectations for the candidate. Define the minimum requirements and any preferred qualifications for applicants.

jobDescription.label: Job Description
jobDescription.placeholder: Describe the scope and focus of the position...
jobDescription.descriptionHelper: Describe the research context, goals, and overall scope of the position. Keep it concise but informative.
jobDescription.toolTipText: Help the applicant understand the research focus and goals of the position.

tasks.label: Tasks & Responsibilities
tasks.descriptionHelper: List the main responsibilities or activities the candidate will be involved in. Bullet points are recommended.
tasks.toolTipText: Provide a clear picture of the position’s responsibilities and activities.

requirements.label: Eligibility Criteria
requirements.placeholder: List the minimum requirements for applicants...
requirements.descriptionHelper: Specify the minimum requirements (e.g., degree, grades, language proficiency) applicants must fulfill.
requirements.toolTipText: Ensure the applicant knows what qualifications are expected.

extras.title: Extras
extras.description: Add custom questions that applicants will see in the application form.

additionalInformationSection.dataPrivacyText: A Data Privacy Statement from the Technical University of Munich (TUM) will automatically be attached to this job. For more information, please visit: TUM Data Protection Information.
additionalInformationSection.dataPrivacyConfirmationText: I have read and understood the Data Privacy Statement and consent to the processing of my personal data as described therein.
additionalInformationSection.dataPrivacyErrorText: Please confirm that you have read and understood the Data Privacy Statement and consent to the processing of your personal data in order to proceed.

confirmDialog.message: Are you sure you want to publish your doctorate position? Once published, further edits will NOT be possible.

reviewPageSection.title: Overview
reviewPageSection.message: Please review your entries before publishing the doctorate position.

confirmDialog.closeMessage: Are you sure you want to close this position? Once closed, applicants will no longer be able to apply for this position. This action can NOT be undone.
confirmDialog.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this draft? This action can NOT be undone!

By submitting your application, you confirm that you have acknowledged the above data protection information of TUM.
